column4: anyone ever have problem with a certain mobo not liking IDE drives??  Took me awhile to realize there's no problem with SATA drives, so I'm guessing it's the IDE controller or something... ??
Gigabyte GA-G33M-DS2R board for anyone that cares
I had a problem with cd drives related to the move to SATA... I hear it's gonna be fixed in gutsy
even if it did, it's not quite useable at this point
